packages.name: Ring Alarm Keypad G2 - Advanced Driver
packages.description: This supports chime capability, triggering rules via code, code-less arming, rearming from partial without disarm, driving/syncing with HSM and Modes, and Hub Mesh with HSM on different hub. This also gives you access to all configurable settings for the Ring Alarm Keypad G2.

packages.name: Ring Alarm Contact Sensor G2 - Advanced Driver
packages.description: This supports button functionality and fixes the common issue of the device becoming unresponsive. This also gives you access to all configurable settings for the Ring Alarm Contact Sensor G2.
